<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stand Still](/Feats.aspx?ID=5996) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach uses a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) action or leaves a square during a move action it’s using.

</column>

---

You strike out when your foe tries to flee. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) action, you disrupt that action.
name: Stand Still
